MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL57 postcode area of Bethesda, affecting properties in Cilgeraint and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.18am. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.21am on Jan 30, 2021
